channel.title: CVE Feed for Go standard library -- net

item.title: CVE-2024-24788|2024-06-12T19:40:33.056Z -- go%20standard%20library -- net
item.description: A malformed DNS message in response to a query can cause the Lookup functions to get stuck in an infinite loop.
